data.title: Jamal Crawford Player Profile, Brooklyn Nets
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Jamal Crawford on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 28, 2000 - The Cleveland Cavaliers selected Jamal Crawford in Round 1 with Pick 8 in the 2000 NBA Draft. Jun 28, 2000 - The draft rights to Jamal Crawford was acquired by the Chicago Bulls, along with cash, from the Cleveland Cavaliers in exchange for the draft rights to Chris Mihm. Sep 25, 2000 - Jamal Crawford signed a multi-year contract with the Chicago Bulls. Oct 28, 2002 - The Chicago Bulls exercised their Team Option to extend the contract of Jamal Crawford. Jun 30, 2004 - The Chicago Bulls tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Jamal Crawford a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2004 - Jamal Crawford, previously with the Chicago Bulls, became a free agent. Aug 5, 2004 - Jamal Crawford was acquired by the New York Knicks, along with Jerome Williams, from the Chicago Bulls in exchange for Othella Harrington, Dikembe Mutombo, Cezary Trybanski and Frankie Williams. Aug 5, 2004 - Jamal Crawford signed a multi-year contract with the Chicago Bulls as part of an eventual sign and trade to New York Knicks. Nov 21, 2008 - Jamal Crawford was acquired by the Golden State Warriors, along with a TPE, from the New York Knicks in exchange for Al Harrington. Jun 25, 2009 - Jamal Crawford voided his ability to terminate his contract early. Jun 25, 2009 - Jamal Crawford was acquired by the Atlanta Hawks from the Golden State Warriors in exchange for Speedy Claxton and Acie Law. Jul 1, 2011 - Jamal Crawford, previously with the Atlanta Hawks, became a free agent. Dec 16, 2011 - Jamal Crawford signed a multi-year contract with the Portland Trail Blazers. Jul 1, 2012 - Jamal Crawford, previously with the Portland Trail Blazers, became a free agent. Jul 11, 2012 - Jamal Crawford signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Clippers. Jul 1, 2016 - Jamal Crawford, previously with the Los Angeles Clippers, became a free agent. Jul 8, 2016 - Jamal Crawford signed a multi-year contract with the Los Angeles Clippers. Jul 6, 2017 - Jamal Crawford was acquired by the Atlanta Hawks, along with Diamond Stone, a conditional 2018 1st round pick (HOU own) and cash, from the Los Angeles Clippers in exchange for a 2019 2nd round pick (WAS own). Jul 8, 2017 - The Atlanta Hawks placed the contract of Jamal Crawford on waivers. Jul 10, 2017 - Jamal Crawford, previously with the Atlanta Hawks, became a free agent. Jul 19, 2017 - Jamal Crawford signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves. Jul 1, 2018 - Jamal Crawford, previously with the Minnesota Timberwolves, became a free agent. Oct 16, 2018 - Jamal Crawford signed a contract with the Phoenix Suns. Jul 1, 2019 - Jamal Crawford, previously with the Phoenix Suns, became a free agent. Jul 3, 2019 - The Phoenix Suns renounced their free-agent exception rights to Jamal Crawford.
